summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Denny Way in the City of Seattle, from Twenty-third Avenue to Thirty-second Avenue, by grading and regrading the same, and by constructing wooden curbs, gutters and crosswalks, and concrete sidewalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 530 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
